name: NYX Professional Makeup Powder Puff Lippie - Squad Goals
review: Hard to get colour out but very nice colour

name: NYX Professional Makeup Powder Puff Lippie - Squad Goals
review: not chalky on your lips, actually very creamy. Good amount of pigment.

name: NYX Professional Makeup Powder Puff Lippie - Squad Goals
review: Looks 5 shades lighter than what you see on the phone. More a bright pink colour.

name: NYX Professional Makeup Powder Puff Lippie - Squad Goals
review: The colour didn't match the picture at all. It is hot pink, yuck. But worst of all the lipstick doesn't stay on properly, cakes around lines and makes my lips look stained. Comes off super easily. No idea why this has so many good reviews.

name: NYX Professional Makeup Powder Puff Lippie - Squad Goals
review: マット感を演出したい時には、うってつけの商品だと思います！とにかくマット！重ねれば重ねるほど色味が重なり濃くなっていきます。好きな濃さを調整できるタイプです。ポンポンと優しく唇に塗布するだけで、薄づきマット唇が出来上がります！！

name: NYX Professional Makeup Powder Puff Lippie - Squad Goals
review: Es mi marca y artículo para labios favorito.Me encanta su textura. Es mate pero hidratante, no reseca, parece que no llevas nada en los labios y tienen muchos colores. A mí me encanta el nude y el número 1 color marrón que en mis labios se ve súper natural, también. Los uso a diario. Durán un montón y no se manchan o rompen por el formato en el que vienen. Tampoco es necesario perfilador. Y de precio están más baratos en Amazon que en la propia página de NYX.

name: NYX Professional Makeup Powder Puff Lippie - Squad Goals
review: 薄くも濃くもできてめっちゃ使いやすいです！良い色！ハーフメイクにピッタリ！注文した翌日に届きました！

name: NYX Professional Makeup Powder Puff Lippie - Squad Goals
review: Per me fantastico!! Il colore è stupendo la durata abbastanza se non mangi e bevi ma il colore ragazze è il top Nyx sempre una garanzia !! È anche idratante

name: NYX Professional Makeup Powder Puff Lippie - Squad Goals
review: Different to most lipsticks I have tried. Has a soft brush like tip which you dab on your lips to get the colour,leaves a gorgeous powdery nude colour. I would not say it is particularly long lasting but lasts longer than the standard glossy lipsticks.
date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 7 September 2023

name: NYX Professional Makeup Powder Puff Lippie - Squad Goals
review: Super rouge a lèvres , très beaux et super texture en plus animal cruelty free

name: NYX Professional Makeup Powder Puff Lippie - Squad Goals
review: 02のパピーラブで可愛らしく上品な色で気にいりました。

name: NYX Professional Makeup Powder Puff Lippie - Squad Goals
review: It feels great to put on. Colour is BEAUTIFUL. It's my favorite product from NYX ❤

name: NYX Professional Makeup Powder Puff Lippie - Squad Goals
review: Está hermoso el color, suave en los labios. Se siente cómodo, no me importa qué tanto dura, me encanta

name: NYX Professional Makeup Powder Puff Lippie - Squad Goals
review: I think I just found my perfect nude lipstick. Cool Intention is very pretty and suitable for a natural autumn look.

name: NYX Professional Makeup Powder Puff Lippie - Squad Goals
review: ベタつかなくサラサラでとてもよかったです。

name: NYX Professional Makeup Powder Puff Lippie - Squad Goals
review: Tolle Farbe. Fühlt sich gut auf den Lippen an.

name: NYX Professional Makeup Powder Puff Lippie - Squad Goals
review: Rich, elegant, smooth and sophisticated, this red gives “classic” and classy. It’s easy to apply, stays on my lips (not my teeth) and is long lasting. You’ll love it! 👄
date: Reviewed in the United States on 6 February 2024

name: NYX Professional Makeup Powder Puff Lippie - Squad Goals
review: It is soft, powdery and pillowy effect. LOVE IT!

name: NYX Professional Makeup Powder Puff Lippie - Squad Goals
review: La esponja es muy comoda y de facil aplicacion

name: NYX Professional Makeup Powder Puff Lippie - Squad Goals
review: Jag trivs bra med produkten

name: NYX Professional Makeup Powder Puff Lippie - Squad Goals
review: つけた感じはサラッとしています。色の発色は箱のままの色味で、発色もよいです。スポンジで、塗るリップも初でこのカラーは、落ち着いた大人な感じの色味です。

name: NYX Professional Makeup Powder Puff Lippie - Squad Goals
review: パウダー調のマッドタイプ・リップクリームです。唇が光らないので自然な表情の顔になります。

name: NYX Professional Makeup Powder Puff Lippie - Squad Goals
review: 簡単にサッと塗れて、マット感なのにパサつきも気にならずマスクにもつきにくいので気に入りました。他の色も購入したいと思います。

name: NYX Professional Makeup Powder Puff Lippie - Squad Goals
review: i love it and its so velvety i recommend
date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 24 February 2024

name: NYX Professional Makeup Powder Puff Lippie - Squad Goals
review: Absolutely fantastic! My new favourite!! My lips always look pale but this lasts hours, looks more natural and makes my lips look fuller.

name: NYX Professional Makeup Powder Puff Lippie - Squad Goals
review: Bellissimo rossetto, all'inizio non ero molto sicura anche perché non capivo come si mettesse alla fine però sono rimasta molto soddisfatta lo ammetto. Texture molto cremosa e duratura, colore molto bello come da foto, e in più ha un buonissimo profumo. Bello bello bello mi piace consigliato. Infatti penso che proverò anche gli altri colori disponibili.

name: NYX Professional Makeup Powder Puff Lippie - Squad Goals
review: Me encanta que sea como un mouse y el color es divino

name: NYX Professional Makeup Powder Puff Lippie - Squad Goals
review: 色もマット感も持ちも良いです！つけやすいのも◯リップライナーがいらないほどの発色とのせやすさです。保湿に関しては元々敏感肌の唇なので、やはりつけた日の夜はしっかり保湿しないと荒れてしまいます。

name: NYX Professional Makeup Powder Puff Lippie - Squad Goals
review: Lovely color but if you have trypophobia like I do this product will be Squimish for you
date: Reviewed in the United States on 21 February 2024

name: NYX Professional Makeup Powder Puff Lippie - Squad Goals
review: Nickel j’ai eu peur que ça soit trop foncé mais pas du toutJ’applique sur les lèvres en tapotant sans trop appuyer et j’estompe avec mon doigt ça tient super bien c’est parfaitSent super bonJ’ai des lèvres fines et je j’utilise juste pour colorer les lèvres naturellement et c’est parfait ça donne un effet repulpé et plus vif aux lèvresA combiner avec un gloss transparent par dessus et c’est parfaitLa teinte squad goals c’est la couleur la plus semblable aux lèvres naturelles donc foncez 🫶🏻🫶🏻
